channel.title: Duel arena - There is no "Challenge" option?
channel.description:
I downloaded RuneFX base and I plan to make some changes and increase my java knowledge, it's actually quite fun however I've come to a brick wall I can assure you I've tried my best with this.
My problem is: In the duel arena there is no challenge option?, and in the bottom right hand corner the duel arena battle axe just flickers non stop? any ideas.
I contacted the server owner he said that "The duel arena is quoted out go to client class" He didn't really explain it enough for me to fix the problem, know what he meant.
Does anyone have an idea on what I can do - Thanks. Yours sincerely, Era

item.title: Duel arena - There is no "Challenge" option?

item.title: Duel arena - There is no "Challenge" option?
item.dc:creator: @Eraa Eraa
item.description:
@Eraa wrote:

I got some errors, when i did the above comment.

src\server\model\players\Client.java:894: cannot find symbol
symbol : method walkableInterface(int)
location: class server.model.players.Client
walkableInterface(201);
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:896: cannot find symbol
symbol : method showOption(int,int,java.lang.String,int)
location: class server.model.players.Client
showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
^
src\server\model\players\Client.java:898: cannot find symbol
symbol : method showOption(int,int,java.lang.String,int)
location: class server.model.players.Client
showOption(3, 0, “Challenge”, 1);
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Duel arena - There is no "Challenge" option?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

	[code]if (inDuelArena()) {
		walkableInterface(201);
		if(duelStatus == 5) {
			showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
		} else {
			showOption(3, 0, "Challenge", 1);
		}[/code]
